item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, February 28, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US and UK in talks on trade deal that could spare Britain from tariffs
2. US to raise tariffs on China and push ahead with Canada and Mexico levies
3. Citigroup erroneously credited client account with $81tn in ‘near miss’
4. Trump revives Canada’s Liberals in electoral turnaround
5. Global stocks slide as tariff threats add to big tech jitters
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, February 28, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
